title: Data Protection and Privacy Act
content: This act establishes the rules for collecting, storing, and processing personal data. Organizations must ensure data security and comply with consent requirements.

title: Intellectual Property Rights Law
content: This law protects creative works, inventions, trademarks, and patents. It defines ownership, licensing, and enforcement procedures for intellectual property.

title: Employment Standards Act
content: Regulates minimum wage, work hours, overtime, leave, and workplace safety. Employers must comply to avoid legal penalties.

title: Contract Law Basics
content: Covers formation, performance, and enforcement of contracts. Includes terms, obligations, and remedies in case of breach.

title: Consumer Protection Regulations
content: Ensures fair trade practices, product safety, and transparent advertising. Consumers have rights to refunds, repairs, and compensation for defective products.

title: Environmental Compliance Act
content: Mandates businesses to follow environmental standards, manage waste responsibly, and reduce emissions. Violations can lead to fines and legal action.

title: Cybersecurity Framework
content: Outlines standards for network security, data breach responses, and risk management. Companies must implement protocols to protect digital assets.

title: Corporate Governance Code
content: Defines roles, responsibilities, and ethical standards for board members and executives. Ensures accountability and transparency in corporate management.

title: Anti-Money Laundering Law
content: Requires financial institutions to report suspicious transactions and maintain records. Non-compliance results in strict penalties.

title: Intellectual Property Licensing Agreement Template
content: Provides a standard framework for licensing software, trademarks, and patents. Covers rights, limitations, royalties, and termination clauses.
